title: [bug] NSIS updater fails to launch the new version installer when installMode is basicUi

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

Use basicUi for installMode, when the updater closes the old version app,  the new version installer does not  run or show, and user cannot continue and upgrade to new version app. 
Use passive for installMode, there is no problem, the new version installer runs, updates, relaunches smoothly.

### Reproduction

_No response_

### Expected behavior

Use basicUi for installMode, the updater closes the old app, the new version installer should run and update, let user continue to upgrade app.

### Platform and versions

```text
[✔] Environment
    - OS: Windows 10.0.19045 X64
    ✔ WebView2: 119.0.2151.72
    ✔ MSVC:
        - Visual Studio Community 2019
        - Visual Studio 生成工具 2022
    ✔ rustc: 1.73.0 (cc66ad468 2023-10-03)
    ✔ cargo: 1.73.0 (9c4383fb5 2023-08-26)
    ✔ rustup: 1.26.0 (5af9b9484 2023-04-05)
    ✔ Rust toolchain: stable-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc (default)
    - node: 16.18.0
    - yarn: 3.2.4
    - npm: 8.19.2

[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 1.5.2
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 1.5.0
    - wry [RUST]: 0.24.4
    - tao [RUST]: 0.16.4
    - tauri-cli [RUST]: 1.5.5
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 1.5.1
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 1.5.6

[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - distDir: ../dist
    - devPath: http://localhost:1420/
    - framework: React (Next.js)
    - bundler: Webpack
```


### Stack trace

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
